title: Elon’s Twitter dilemma
summary: Elon Musk used Twitter to communicate SpaceX's ascent to the top of the space industry. What happens to Musk's space ambitions now that he owns Twitter?

title: ThinkOrbital designing platform for in-space manufacturing, debris removal
summary: ThinkOrbital, a space infrastructure startup, is designing an orbital platform aimed at commercial businesses, military and government agencies that want to manufacture products in orbit or recycle debris.

title: Technical issue likely to blame for Iranian news channel outage, says Eutelsat
summary: A technical issue likely knocked Iran’s Press TV temporarily off the air last week, Eutelsat said as the French satellite operator calls on partners to stop broadcasting the news channel to comply with European sanctions.

title: Artemis I review shows perfect ICPS performance, ULA looks to next Artemis launches
summary: United Launch Alliance (ULA), the prime contractor for the Space Launch System’s (SLS’s) Interim Cryogenic Propulsion Stage (ICPS), has declared the stage’s overall performance on the Artemis I mission as “perfect.”

title: NASA official “very confident” Artemis spacesuits will be ready on time
summary: "They have invested a lot of their own money into the suits."
